Posted By: AEKblackheart (7/23/2010 2:30:48 AM)
Rating:

posts.post_content:
eh, nobody would counter this if I played it, for a few reasons, 1 they should know better than to sacrifice one of their creatures to get rid of one of mine (mine will come back theirs wont) and two they very likely wont have many options about what to sacrifice (unless they have a bunch of token generators that usually skrews my deck over big time.)  
the other reason I wont use this card is because as I mentioned before, for me it's just a 4/2 zombie for 4 mana, I don't really use discarding that much (except a couple cards for the sake of getting big things out faster) so I'd usually be hardcasting it.
posts.html:

the other reason I wont use this card is because as I mentioned before, for me it's just a 4/2 zombie for 4 mana, I don't really use discarding that much (except a couple cards for the sake of getting big things out faster) so I'd usually be hardcasting it.
